page.content: The main land use in this sector is where marshland has been drained to provide rough grazing for sheep.There are laso small crofts where a few fodder crops and vegetables would be grown. The large forestry plantations are typically planted in rectangular blocks and this provides shelter for the surrounding plots of land. There is also a large river running through this area and is used in assisting with the draining of the marshland as it carries away the runoff. This landscape is also reasonably hilly with the ground,in some places, rising well over three hundred feet above sea level.
